interactions.Alarm:
The user, a young married professional in his late 20s from the United States, frequently interacts with the alarm domain to manage his weekday morning routine. He prefers setting a recurring alarm for 8:00 AM on weekdays, with an upbeat music track as the alarm sound.

Early interactions involved experimenting with different alarm tones, eventually settling on an energetic pop song to help him wake up feeling motivated. The user appreciates the ability to preview alarm sounds before setting them.

Over time, he has requested additional features like the option to set a backup alarm a few minutes after the primary one, in case he accidentally dismisses the first alarm while still half-asleep. He also inquired about the possibility of integrating weather information into the alarm, so he can dress appropriately for the day.

The user values the assistant's ability to set alarms quickly and efficiently with minimal input required. He occasionally provides feedback on the alarm's volume level, requesting adjustments to ensure it's loud enough to wake him up without being excessively disruptive.

During weekends or holidays, the user often disables the recurring alarm or sets temporary one-time alarms for later in the day, depending on his plans. He has expressed interest in the ability to set location-based alarms, which could be useful for waking up on time during travel.

Overall, the user appreciates the assistant's reliable and customizable alarm capabilities, which help him start his workdays on time and in a positive mindset.
